modName: All Essential NPCs Are Now Just Protected --WIP-- - DELETED
summary: Replaces the "Essential" tag on NPCs with the "Protected" tag, making the normally immortal NPCs killable but by YOU only.
descriptionHtml:
Tired of trying to sack a town only to find some random essential guardian protects it? Tired of trying to destroy an enemy faction camp only to find an immortal field commander? Don't want to remove the protection that Essential NPCs were supposed to add?

This mod replaces the "Essential" tag on NPCs with the "Protected" tag, making the normally immortal NPCs killable but by YOU only, maintaining the protection on the vanilla game while still allowing for a more fully immersive experience. This doesn't work for a few NPCs that didn't have the essential tag to begin with but are still essential such as "Aela The Huntress" or certain NPCs that I couldn't edit, a complete list of NPCs I couldn't edit can be found in the ReadMe. If I missed any NPCs please let me know, I will try my hardest to fix them and if I can't I will update the ReadMe with their names.

Incompatibilities-
None that I know of, Leave a comment if you find one.
author: Aicanter
